heading: Sunday Night
text: Clouds are continuing to fade, becoming mostly clear overnight. Fog develops in the valleys after midnight. Lows in the upper 20s northeast to mid 30s southwest. Winds calm.

heading: Monday
text: Some morning sun, then more clouds north, with an increasing chance of showers through New York in the afternoon. Showers are spreading east during the early evening. Milder. Highs in the 50s, near 50 north. Wind speeds increase to 15 mph out of the southwest.

heading: Monday Night
text: Showers tapering off in New York, continuing across the Green and White Mountains after sunset, heaviest north. Scattered showers after midnight, mixing with flurries over the high hills. Lows in the mid to upper 30s. Gusty, southwest winds shifting west overnight, 15 to 20 mph, gusting to 30.
